item.description:
Looking for something different to try? Something good, fun and inexpensive? How about a great Greek meal at Cavos in Newington!

Great comfort food...mouthwatering Greek delacacies...available here for your enjoyment. Read what one reviewer had to say...

"These guys are doing it right! It is SO exciting to visit a Greek restaurant with such a great menu selection of actual Greek dishes reaching beyond gyros and grapes leaves (no hate on those either, but just saying...). And a family-run, small business with owners you can meet and have a drink with and feel good about supporting... And the value for the price... And the service... all around, awesome. Internet-high-five!".

Sound interesting? Let's give it a try! Join us and have a great meal with friends, old and new. Terrific conversation...a few laughs...warm smiles. Ahhh...life is good!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Terri or the Meetup Sign...
item.why: We all need a little comfort food once in awhile!

group.name: MIXING IT UP IN WEST HARTFORD AND BEYOND

item.name: Going Greek @ Cavos Tavern & Pizzeria in Newington!
